subject: Re: JUnit bug for XML testing?
msgSnippet: ... If it helps, here are a couple answers I tried to answer pretty definitively (explaining exactly why and how to work around . . .).  It would be an honor
messageBody:
> We're working on making the FAQ better. The fact
> that I'm digging through the archives for these
> nuggets says something.

If it helps, here are a couple answers I tried to answer pretty
definitively (explaining exactly why and how to work around . . .). It
would be an honor to have them added to the FAQ:

Q: Why a ClassCastException when you narrow() in an EJB client TestCase?
A: Date: Mon Jul 16, 2001 5:11 pm
Subject: RE: [junit] ClassCastException only using swing/awt ui


Q: Why do I get a LinkageError when using XML interfaces in my TestCase?
A: Date: Tue Jul 10, 2001 11:32 pm
Subject: RE: [junit] Class loader error with junit


Scott Stirling
Framingham, MA
